name: AMERICANS FOR DEMOCRACY
sampleDescriptions: Equal treatment for Puerto Rico in federal programs including Medicaid, Medicare, food/nutrition security and SSI; Constitutional options for the Puerto Rico's political status; Puerto Rico Statehood
